name: Road to Ballhalla Soundtrack
reviews:
“Oh my word the music. It’s gorgeous.”
Ordinary Gamer
short_description: Full soundtrack of the game, including the background music for all 20 trials + hub world and ascension to Ballhalla.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
